title: Error while trying to update game
body: I'm trying to update my LOL to the most recent update, and every time I try, it stops near half way and says "update failed" and check logs. I have no idea what to do from this point. How am I going to fix the problem? I've tried resetting my laptop, and it still didn't help!

replies.body:
Hey Clannad20,

Getting an "Update Failed" error usually indicates there is an unstable connection, or there is a 3rd party security software that is blocking League of Legends from downloading patch content.  To that end, I strongly recommend that you complete all of the steps in the following Knowledge Base Article, which solves the majority of these issues:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/22114820-Firewall-Configuration-for-League-of-Legends

If you are still experiencing issues, even after completing all of these steps, then please submit a new ticket to Player Support, which you can find here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

If you do submit a ticket, make sure that you provide the following latest and most up to date information:

1) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

2) NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list
